title: 3159 Hanover St
posting_body: FEATURES:  This beautiful home on a spacious corner lot is within walking distance to the East Bridge Town Center in Central Park.
Gleaming hardwood floors and new paint offers a stunning living space.

Conveniently located in the NE corner of South Central Park, the home is in close proximity to Anschutz Medical Campus with easy access to I-70, DIA, Gaylord Marriott of the Rockies, and Downtown Denver!
The home also features a community pool and is close to parks, playgrounds and walking trails!!
All other utilities paid by tenant.
BEDROOMS & BATHROOMS: 4 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, one 3/4 bathroom and one 1/2 bathroom
LAUNDRY: Washer and dryer included on second floor
FLOORING: Main level wood, basement and upstairs are carpet, some bathrooms are tile
HEAT/COOLING: Forced heat air and central AC
RESTRICTIONS: 2 Pets are considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.
Sorry, but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier.
Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.
Please note we have a 700 minimum credit score for all properties.
**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 2 weeks of the property's listed availability date.
LEASE TERM:  Initial lease to end April through June of 2023 with 12-month extensions possible at that time.
Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.
